nodes.text: Joyride Group was the name given to the members of Wraith Squadron who were responsible for stealing two TIE/LN starfighters during the Mission to Storinal.

Upon arriving on Storinal, group consisted of Wes Janson playing Senator-in-Exile Iskit Tyestin of Bakura and his entourage of Falynn Sandskimmer, Atril Tabanne and Voort saBinring as guards. Joyride Group would be joined by the members of Yokel Group for their starfighter theft.
